Type.BattleDialog: …Something’s off about the atmosphere. What’s up with her?
Why do you talk like you know me?
…That, definitely wasn’t a pushover.
…I’m counting on you. Give me the strength to tear my foes apart.
Let’s start this for real. I’ll crush you all…
Was that… a Singularity…? I let my guard down…
…Why is there someone capable of wielding those powers in a place like this?
…What bullshit are you trying to pull here?
This is real wicked. Did you shapeshift to look like me on purpose?
Let’s see if you have the talent to keep up with me…
…And I thought she looked like me for a second. It was nothing more than a cheap imitation.
The real fight starts now…
I can’t stop here…
Dammit… I’ll break you all…
She acted just like me… How did…
So, you’re the “trials” this place has to present to me?
I’ve gotta figure out how strong the enemy is first…
Are you part of a Fixer Office? Or some kind of Syndicate?
You were just another fancy-looking bunch with no substance, after all.
Alright… I see how tough you are.
…Let’s try and protect what we cherish here.
…! Shoot, I lowered my guard…
I can’t lose to those strangers…
Be mindful of your own well-being.
O child… It is verily refreshing to meet you this way.
Your willingness to stand by me is admirable, but please do beware.
…You shall crumble.
Stand back. I reckon this is not the place for you to intervene.
It was still too dangerous for you, I see.
Indeed. Withstanding her power was too arduous a task for you.
It is not completely concluded yet, now is it?
How intriguing. You were capable of wielding that power so far in the past…
Myself… from the past, huh.
The one person I know better than anyone, yet I know the least about at the same time.
Even if much time has passed, some things stay the same. Remember how I fight, guys?
That didn’t feel too nice.
…Yeah. That was nothing to scoff at.
Don’t get intimidated. We have to believe in ourselves.
We lose the moment our spirit is dampened. Don’t give up.
We can do it on our own.
It was that armor. To protect everyone…
There’s got to be a way to defeat her still. Don’t be daunted.
The Red Mist in her past glory… Still feels unreal.
…She sure had tremendous strength.
Guess I couldn’t beat her, huh…
Not a big issue yet.
The rest of us can handle it.
…Let’s stay calm.
Looks like she’s done warming up…
